All Implemented Interfaces:
FreeMarkerService
public class DefaultFreeMarkerService
extends AbstractFreeMarkerService

Default implementation of the IMPE3 Interface to the freemarker templating engine.

Author:
Andres Rodriguez

setImgUri

public void setImgUri(URIBuilderService imgUri)

process

public void process(String template,
                    RenderContext context,
                    Locale locale,
                    Object dataModel,
                    Writer output,
                    freemarker.template.ObjectWrapper wrapper,
                    boolean safeMode)
             throws Exception
Description copied from interface: FreeMarkerService
Process a FreeMarker template (low-level method). In case of an exception in safe mode, the exception (offline) or an empty string (online) will be written to the output before rethrowing the exception.

Parameters:
template - Template to process.
context - Component rendering context.
locale - Locale to use or null to use the locale provided by the render context.
dataModel - Data model to use as input.
output - Output writer.
wrapper - FreeMarker object wrapper to use (optional).
Throws:
Exception - If an exception occurs during template processing.
See Also:
FreeMarkerService.process(java.lang.String, com.isotrol.impe3.api.component.RenderContext, java.util.Locale, java.lang.Object, java.io.Writer, freemarker.template.ObjectWrapper, boolean)

                                TemplateModel model)
